titleStmt.title: A memento treating of the rise, progress, and remedies of seditions with some historical reflections upon the series of our late troubles / by Roger L'Estrange.
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed in the year 1642, and now reprinted for Joanna Brome ...,

notesStmt.note: Pages 49-54 are missing in the filmed copy. Pages 40-65 photographed from Cambridge University Library copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
